full_summary:
======================

# Tender Solicitation

## Project Title
RFP for Caulking Maintenance Design at NAFC Center

## Announcement Details

*   **Reference Number**: WS4334449917-Doc4334491771
*   **Publication Date**: December 1, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: December 15, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
*   **Amendment Date**: December 5, 2023
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 31, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A

## procurement details

*   **Procurement Category**: Service
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canada Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: N/A
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Newfoundland and Labrador

## Contracting and End-User Information

*   **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **Contact Person**: Rachel Miller (SPAC/PSPC), rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, 613-988-7619

## Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) invites firms to provide design services for maintenance repairs to the caulking related to the building envelope of the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Center (NAFC) facility in St. John's, NL.

Invited Firms:

*   Fougere Menchenton Architecture Inc.
*   Groupe Leclerc Architecture & Design
*   Nine Yards Inc.
*   MacKay-Lyons Sweetapple Architects
*   Stantec Architecture Ltd.
*   Gibbons Snow Architects Inc.

Tender Criteria

*   Selection will be based on the "highest combined rating of Technical Merit and Price"
*   Debriefing will be provided to unsuccessful bidders within 15 working days of notification

Please refer to the solicitation document for further details
